name: Kaushal Mohan
body:
Well, the site is still under construction. But meanwhile, if you want to contact me, you can drop a mail to kaushalm93@gmail.com and I will get back to you withing 24 hours.

#Oh. You can also

Ping me on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/kaushal.mohan.1), check out my rants on on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaushal_m_01), follow me on [Quora](http://www.quora.com/Kaushal-Mohan), or connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=232790134).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
